paper_abstract: We give a necessary condition and a sufficient condition for a minimum-cost spanning tree game introduced by Bird to be submodular (or convex). When the cost is restricted to two values, we give a characterization of submodular minimum-cost spanning tree games. We also discuss algorithmic issues.Copyright (c) 2014 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. NETWORKS, Vol. 63(3), 231-238 2014
paper_title: Submodularity of minimum-cost spanning tree games
